segments.text: Hello , Rachel . It's glad to see you here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi , Ross . Glad to see you , too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm going to throw a party tomorrow night . Would you like to come ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: A party ? Yes . I'd love to . Thank you for inviting me . Will Monica come ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's great ! What time will it start at ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . I'll come . See you then .
segments.speaker: S2
